extent: U.S. President
Sentence: LONDON ( AP ) The United States and Britain are preparing a resolution that would give the United Nations a role in humanitarian relief but not peacekeeping in Iraq , a senior official in U.S. President George W. Bush 's administration said Friday .

extent: Six European countries have agreed to contribute troops to the British and Polish sectors to create an international stability force, the official said
Sentence: Six European countries have agreed to contribute troops to the British and Polish sectors to create an international stability force , the official said .

extent: The six nations contributing troops are Italy, Spain, Ukraine, Denmark, the Netherlands and Bulgaria, the official said
Sentence: The six nations contributing troops are Italy , Spain , Ukraine , Denmark , the Netherlands and Bulgaria , the official said .

extent: Six European countries have agreed to contribute troops to the British and Polish sectors to create an international stability force, the official said

extent: U.N. officials are already in Iraq providing humanitarian relief
Sentence: U.N. officials are already in Iraq providing humanitarian relief .

extent: U.N. Secretary General
Sentence: U.N. Secretary General Kofi Annan said this week that the body has no interest in policing a postwar Iraq , although it could contribute to the political resuscitation of the country .

extent: U.N. Security Council
Sentence: The proposed draft resolution would probably face resistance from other U.N. Security Council members who have favored a U.N.-convened conference of the kind that helped establish Afghanistan 's post-Taliban government .

extent: U.S. Defense
Sentence: U.S. Defense Secretary Donald H. Rumsfeld discussed the resolution with Prime Minister Tony Blair and Defense Secretary Geoff Hoon on Friday as Rumsfeld returned from a tour of Iraq , Afghanistan and the Persian Gulf region .

extent: International stability forces will be sent to Iraq as soon as possible, the U.S. official said, though it was unclear when that would be
Sentence: International stability forces will be sent to Iraq as soon as possible , the U.S. official said , though it was unclear when that would be .

extent: the U.S. official
Sentence: International stability forces will be sent to Iraq as soon as possible , the U.S. official said , though it was unclear when that would be .

extent: Representatives of those countries
Sentence: Representatives of those countries will meet with British officials May 7 and Polish officials May 22 to determine what forces each country will contribute and whether they will be put under British or Polish command .

extent: British officials
Sentence: Representatives of those countries will meet with British officials May 7 and Polish officials May 22 to determine what forces each country will contribute and whether they will be put under British or Polish command .

extent: the troop strength of the other two sectors
Sentence: While that portion is likely to consist of a military division _ about 20,000 _ the troop strength of the other two sectors has yet to be determined , the official said .

extent: the U.S. war commander
Sentence: The international stabilization force would be under the U.S. war commander , Gen. Tommy Franks .

extent: the 135,000 American troops inside Iraq
Sentence: At least initially , the coalition stability forces will augment rather than replace the 135,000 American troops inside Iraq , the official said .

extent: the 135,000 American troops inside Iraq
Sentence: At least initially , the coalition stability forces will augment rather than replace the 135,000 American troops inside Iraq , the official said .

extent: leftover members of Saddam Hussein's government

mentionArg1.extent: leftover members of Saddam Hussein's government

Sentence: The stability forces will focus on providing security and humanitarian relief while other U.S. troops focus on rooting out leftover members of Saddam Hussein 's government and other armed elements in Iraq .

Sentence: Requests for such authorization will be routed through the alliance 's defense planning committee , which does not include France , the official said .

extent: representatives from 16 countries, mostly NATO members

Sentence: The outlines for the international stability force were decided at a conference Hoon hosted Wednesday with representatives from 16 countries , mostly NATO members .

extent: ethnic, religious, tribal and political factions within Iraq

mentionArg1.extent: ethnic, religious, tribal and political factions within Iraq

Sentence: The U.S. , British and Polish sectors will be drawn to take into account ethnic , religious , tribal and political factions within Iraq , the official said .

extent: For example, although ethnic Kurds are the majority in large parts of northern Iraq, there are also large numbers of Kurds within Baghdad
Sentence: For example , although ethnic Kurds are the majority in large parts of northern Iraq , there are also large numbers of Kurds within Baghdad .

extent: large numbers of Kurds within Baghdad

extent: Some Arab countries also want to play a role in the stability operation in Iraq but are reluctant to send troops because of political, religious and ethnic considerations, the official said

extent: King Abdullah of Jordan
Sentence: Rumsfeld also met Friday with King Abdullah of Jordan , an American ally in the Middle East .

extent: Defense officials
Sentence: Defense officials say Jordan provided key help in the Iraq war , acting as a staging area for U.S. special operations raids into western Iraq to prevent missiles from being fired at Jordan or Israel .
